item.title: Node Passport Login
item.description: nodejs with passport Creating a web application often involves some sort of login and user management. This is a short example of using nodejs with passport’s built in strategies for local (with mongodb) and google OAuth2. Passport, http://www.passportjs.org/, have strategies for almost every provider there is. Very handy. I won’t list all source code, you’ll find that in the Github repo. Instead, some highlights are shown below. Here is the Github repo with complete sourcecode.
